description: Try our easy to follow Salmon Skewers And Little Gem Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Salmon Skewers And Little Gem Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Australian Tasmanian Atlantic Salmon Fillets Skin On
Cobram Estate Classic Extra Virgin Olive Oil 750ml
Praise Deli Style Honey & Apple Cider Dressing
One Night In Mexico Flame Grilled BBQ Seasoning

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the salmon into 2cm thick pieces and remove the skin. Combine 1 tablespoon oil and the seasoning in a bowl. Add the salmon, stir gently to coat. Thread the salmon onto skewers. Cover. Refrigerate 5-10 minutes.
For the salad; Combine the cucumber, radish and chives in a bowl. Pour over the dressing and toss gently to coat.

Preheat barbecue grill and plate on medium high. Brush both sides for ciabatta with remaining oil then barbecue on the grill for 3 minutes each side until lightly charred. Barbecue the salmon skewers on the plate for 4 minutes, turning until cooked to your liking.
Arrange the lettuce leaves on serving plates. Fill each with a spoonful of salad. Serve with chargrilled ciabatta and salmon skewers, drizzled with aioli.
